name: Chromagen
indications: indications: chromagen™ multivitamin/multimineral dietary supplement indicated improving nutritional status patients iron deficiency.
contraindications: : chromagen™ contraindicated patients known hypersensitivity ingredients.
warningsAndPrecautions: precautions: folic acid alone improper therapy treatment pernicious anemia megaloblastic anemias vitamin b 12 deficient. folic acid doses 1.0 mg daily may obscure pernicious anemia hematologic remission occur neurological manifestations progress.
adverseReactions: reactions: allergic sensitization reported following oral parenteral folic acid.
indications_original: INDICATIONS: Chromagen™ is a multivitamin/multimineral dietary supplement indicated for use in improving the nutritional status of patients with iron deficiency.
contraindications_original: CONTRAINDICATIONS : Chromagen™ is contraindicated in patients with a known hypersensitivity to any of the ingredients.
warningsAndPrecautions_original: PRECAUTIONS: Folic acid alone is improper therapy in the treatment of pernicious anemia and other megaloblastic anemias where Vitamin B 12 is deficient. Folic acid in doses above 1.0 mg daily may obscure pernicious anemia in that hematologic remission can occur while neurological manifestations progress.
adverseReactions_original: ADVERSE REACTIONS: Allergic sensitization has been reported following both oral and parenteral administration of folic acid.
